entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve "Convert regular string to interpolated string" refactoring #60148
  • Add Diagnostic ID column for Code Style/Whitespace/Naming Style in EditorConfig UI #60147
  • InlineHints `SuppressForParametersThatMatchMethodIntent` does not match local functions #60145
  • An exception that occurs after.NET Core is compiled to a single file #60144

Closed

  • Static abstract delegate creation within generic code cached into non-generic location #60069
    17.2
  • Convert to interpolated string does not support constants #52243
    Backlog
  • `Debug.Fail` fires for "Remove unused value" code fix provider #60030
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure declaring compilation can be located for source symbols created during compilation for EE evaluation. #60152
    Area-Compilers
  • Support property initializer statement completion #60151
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #60150
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #60149
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #60142
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Run two attempts of new integration tests using harness functionality #60139
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Adjust delegate caching logic for abstract statics. #60092
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Support converting to interpolated string for constants if language version is cpable of this #60146
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fixed codefix "Use discard pattern" incorrectly applied to foreach in top-level statements #60138
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Respond with updated diagnostics when EnC diagnostics state is different #60081
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60143
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60141
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60140
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Light Bulb workarounds for 17.2 CI machines #60104
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60153
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Support smart pasting of contents into strings. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unneeded `isPartial` check #59978
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Provide name suggestions based on both collection and its element type #60129
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
